Constructor Detail

CoreContextFactory

public CoreContextFactory(boolean autoFilterAndSort,
                          WebContext webContext)

You would call this contructor if you do not want the items filtered and sorted. You would only use this if you manually filtered and sorted the items to display a page of data and, in which case, there is no reason to do it again.

Parameters:
autoFilterAndSort - Is false if you do not want to have the items filtered and sorted automatically by the API.
webContext - The WebContext for the table.

createCoreContext

public CoreContext createCoreContext(Collection<?> items,
                                     Limit limit,
                                     Worksheet worksheet)
Take all the attributes of the factory and create a CoreContext object.

Parameters:
items - The Collection of Beans or Maps.
limit - The Limit instance.
Returns:
The newly created CoreContext object.
